Channel.description: A Channel defines the properties for a color channel.

contrastEnhancement.description: A ContrastEnhancement defines how the contrast of image data should be enhanced.

ColorMap.description: A ColorMap defines the color values for the pixels of a raster image.

ColorMapEntry.description: A single entry for the ColorMap.

ColorMapType.description: The Types that are allowed in a ColorMap.

CombinationFilter.description: A CombinationFilter combines N Filters with a logical OR / AND operator.

items.description: The possible Operators used for combination Filters.

ContrastEnhancement.description: A ContrastEnhancement defines how the contrast of image data should be enhanced.

FillSymbolizer.description: A FillSymbolizer describes the style representation of POLYGON data.

antialias.description: Whether the fill should be antialiased or not .

color.description: A color defined as a hex-color string.

fillOpacity.description:
The opacity of the fill. A value between 0 and 1.
0 is none opaque and 1 is full opaque.

graphicFill.description: Renders the fill of the polygon with a repeated pattern of PointSymbolizer.

kind.description: Describes the type of the kind of the Symbolizer.

opacity.description:
Determines the total opacity for the Symbolizer.
A value between 0 and 1. 0 is none opaque and 1 is full opaque.

outlineColor.description:
The outline color as a hex-color string. Matches the value of fill-color if
unspecified.

outlineDasharray.description:
Encodes a dash pattern as an array of numbers. Odd-indexed numbers (first,
third, etc) determine the length in pixels to draw the line, and even-indexed
numbers (second, fourth, etc) determine the length in pixels to blank out
the line. Default is an unbroken line.

outlineOpacity.description:
The opacity of the outline. A value between 0 and 1.
0 is none opaque and 1 is full opaque.

outlineWidth.description: The outline width (pixels if outlineWidthUnit is not defined).

outlineWidthUnit.description: Unit to use for the outlineWidth.

visibility.description: Defines whether the Symbolizer should be visibile or not.

anyOf.description:
A FunctionFilter that expects a string (propertyName) as second argument and
a regular expression as third argument. An actual parser implementation has to
return a value for this function expression.
A Filter that checks if a property is in a range of two values (inclusive).

A FunctionFilter that expects a string (propertyName) as second argument and
a regular expression as third argument. An actual parser implementation has to
return a value for this function expression.

items.description: The possible Operators used for comparison Filters.

anyOf.description:
A FunctionFilter that expects a string (propertyName) as second argument and
a regular expression as third argument. An actual parser implementation has to
return a value for this function expression.

items.description: A value of a property of the data.

anyOf.description: A NegationFilter negates a given Filter.

GrayChannel.description: A GrayChannel defines how a single dataset band is mapped to a grayscale channel.

IconSymbolizer.description:
An IconSymbolizer describes the style representation of POINT data if styled
with a specific icon.

allowOverlap.description:
If true, the icon will be visible even if it collides with other previously
drawn symbols.

anchor.description:
Part of the icon placed closest to the anchor. This may conflict with a set
offset.

avoidEdges.description:
This is a property relevant if using tiled datasets.
If true, the symbols will not cross tile edges to avoid mutual collisions.

color.description: A color defined as a hex-color string.

format.description:
An optional configuration for the image format as MIME type.
This might be needed if the image(path) has no filending specified. e.g. http://myserver/getImage

haloBlur.description: The halo's fadeout distance towards the outside.

haloColor.description:
The color of the icons halo, which helps it stand out from backgrounds represented
as a hex-color string.

haloWidth.description: Distance of halo to the font outline (pixels if haloWidthUnit is not defined).

haloWidthUnit.description: Unit to use for the haloWidth.

image.description: A path/URL to the icon image file.

keepUpright.description: If true, the icon will be kept upright.

kind.description: Describes the type of the kind of the Symbolizer.

offset.description:
The offset of the Symbolizer as [x, y] coordinates. Positive values indicate
right and down, while negative values indicate left and up.

opacity.description:
Determines the total opacity for the Symbolizer.
A value between 0 and 1. 0 is none opaque and 1 is full opaque.

optional.description:
Property relevant for mapbox-styles.
If true, text will display without their corresponding icons when the icon
collides with other symbols and the text does not.

padding.description: Size of the additional area around the icon used for detecting symbol collisions.

rotate.description: The rotation of the Symbolizer in degrees. Value should be between 0 and 360.

size.description: The Symbolizer size (pixels if sizeUnit is not defined).

sizeUnit.description: Unit to use for the size.

visibility.description: Defines whether the Symbolizer should be visibile or not.

LineSymbolizer.description: A LineSymbolizer describes the style representation of LINESTRING data.

cap.description:
Determines how lines are rendered at their ends. Possible values are butt
(sharp square edge), round (rounded edge), and square (slightly elongated
square edge).

color.description: A color defined as a hex-color string.

dashOffset.description:
Number of pixels into the dasharray to offset the drawing of the dash,
used to shift the location of the lines and gaps in a dash.

dasharray.description:
Encodes a dash pattern as an array of numbers. Odd-indexed numbers (first,
third, etc) determine the length in pixels to draw the line, and even-indexed
numbers (second, fourth, etc) determine the length in pixels to blank out
the line. Default is an unbroken line.

gapWidth.description:
Draws a line casing outside of a line's actual path. Value indicates the
width of the inner gap (pixels if gapWidthUnit is not defined).

gapWidthUnit.description: Unit to use for the gapWidth.

gradient.description: Defines a gradient with which to color a line feature.

graphicFill.description: Renders the pixels of the line with a repeated pattern.

graphicStroke.description: Renders the line with a repeated linear PointSymbolizer.

join.description:
Determines how lines are rendered at intersections of line segments.
Possible values are mitre (sharp corner),  round (rounded corner), and bevel
diagonal corner).

kind.description: Describes the type of the kind of the Symbolizer.

miterLimit.description: Used to automatically convert miter joins to bevel joins for sharp angles.

opacity.description:
Determines the total opacity for the Symbolizer.
A value between 0 and 1. 0 is none opaque and 1 is full opaque.

perpendicularOffset.description:
If present, it makes the renderer draw a line parallel to the original one,
at the given distance. When applied on lines, positive values generate a
parallel line on the left hand side, negative values on the right hand side.

roundLimit.description: Used to automatically convert round joins to miter joins for shallow angles.

spacing.description: Distance between two symbol anchors (pixels if spacingUnit is not defined).

spacingUnit.description:
Unit to use for the spacing.
'em' -> fontsize

visibility.description: Defines whether the Symbolizer should be visibile or not.

width.description: The width of the Line (pixels if widthUnit is not defined).

widthUnit.description: Unit to use for the width.

MarkSymbolizer.description:
MarkSymbolizer describes the style representation of POINT data, if styled as
with a regular geometry.

avoidEdges.description:
This is a property relevant if using tiled datasets.
If true, the symbols will not cross tile edges to avoid mutual collisions.

blur.description:
Amount to blur the Symbolizer. 1 blurs the Symbolizer such that only the
centerpoint has full opacity. Mostly relevant for circles.

color.description: A color defined as a hex-color string.

fillOpacity.description:
The opacity of the fill. A value between 0 and 1.
0 is none opaque and 1 is full opaque.

kind.description: Describes the type of the kind of the Symbolizer.

offset.description:
The offset of the Symbolizer as [x, y] coordinates. Positive values indicate
right and down, while negative values indicate left and up.

opacity.description:
Determines the total opacity for the Symbolizer.
A value between 0 and 1. 0 is none opaque and 1 is full opaque.

radius.description:
The radius of the Symbolizer. Values describing the full size of the Symbolizer
have to be divided by two (pixels if radiusUnit is not defined).

radiusUnit.description: Unit to use for the radius.

rotate.description: The rotation of the Symbolizer in degrees. Value should be between 0 and 360.

strokeColor.description: The color of the stroke represented as a hex-color string.

strokeOpacity.description:
The opacity of the stroke. A value between 0 and 1.
0 is none opaque and 1 is full opaque.

strokeWidth.description: The width of the stroke (pixels if strokeWidthUnit is not defined).

strokeWidthUnit.description: Unit to use for the strokeWidth.

visibility.description: Defines whether the Symbolizer should be visibile or not.

NegationFilter.description: A NegationFilter negates a given Filter.

RGBChannel.description: A RGBChannel defines how dataset bands are mapped to image color channels.

RasterSymbolizer.description: A RasterSymbolizer defines the style representation of RASTER data.

colorMap.description: A ColorMap defines the color values for the pixels of a raster image.

contrastEnhancement.description: A ContrastEnhancement defines how the contrast of image data should be enhanced.

Rule.description:
A Rule combines a specific amount of data (defined by a Filter and a
ScaleDenominator) and an associated Symbolizer.

anyOf.description:
A FunctionFilter that expects a string (propertyName) as second argument and
a regular expression as third argument. An actual parser implementation has to
return a value for this function expression.
A Filter that checks if a property is in a range of two values (inclusive).

A FunctionFilter that expects a string (propertyName) as second argument and
a regular expression as third argument. An actual parser implementation has to
return a value for this function expression.

items.description: The possible Operators used for comparison Filters.

anyOf.description:
A FunctionFilter that expects a string (propertyName) as second argument and
a regular expression as third argument. An actual parser implementation has to
return a value for this function expression.

items.description: A value of a property of the data.

anyOf.description: A CombinationFilter combines N Filters with a logical OR / AND operator.
A NegationFilter negates a given Filter.

scaleDenominator.description: The ScaleDenominator defines a range of scales.

ScaleDenominator.description: The ScaleDenominator defines a range of scales.

max.description: Maximum value of the ScaleDenominator. The value is exclusive.

min.description: Minimum value of the ScaleDenominator. The value is inclusive.

TextSymbolizer.description:
The TextSymbolizer describes the style representation of point data, if styled
with a text.

allowOverlap.description:
If true, the text will be visible even if it collides with other previously
drawn symbols.

anchor.description: The anchor position of the label referred to the center of the geometry.

avoidEdges.description:
This is a property relevant if using tiled datasets.
If true, the symbols will not cross tile edges to avoid mutual collisions.

color.description: A color defined as a hex-color string.

font.description: An Array of fonts. Comparable to https://www.w3schools.com/cssref/pr_font_font-family.asp

fontStyle.description:
Specifies whether a font should be styled with a normal, italic, or oblique
face from its font-family.

fontWeight.description:
Specifies the weight (or boldness) of the font. The weights available depend
on the font-family you are using.

haloBlur.description: The halo's fadeout distance towards the outside.

haloColor.description:
The color of the text's halo, which helps it stand out from backgrounds
represented as a hex-color string.

haloWidth.description: Distance of halo to the font outline (pixels if haloWidthUnit is not defined).

haloWidthUnit.description: Unit to use for the haloWidth.

justify.description: Text justification option to align the text.

keepUpright.description: If true, the text will be kept upright.

kind.description: Describes the type of the kind of the Symbolizer.

label.description:
Template string where {{PROPERTYNAME}} can be used to be replaced by values
from the dataset.
e.g.: "Name {{country_name}}"

letterSpacing.description: Sets the spacing between text characters (pixels if letterSpacingUnit is not defined).

letterSpacingUnit.description: Unit to use for the letterSpacing.

lineHeight.description:
Sets the line height (pixels if lineHeightUnit is not defined).
'em' -> fontsize

lineHeightUnit.description:
Unit to use for the lineHeight.
'em' -> fontsize

maxAngle.description: Maximum angle change between adjacent characters in degrees.

maxWidth.description: The maximum line width for text wrapping.

offset.description:
The offset of the Symbolizer as [x, y] coordinates. Positive values indicate
right and down, while negative values indicate left and up.

opacity.description:
Determines the total opacity for the Symbolizer.
A value between 0 and 1. 0 is none opaque and 1 is full opaque.

optional.description:
Property relevant for mapbox-styles.
If true, icons will display without their corresponding text when the text
collides with other symbols and the icon does not.

padding.description:
Size of the additional area around the text bounding box used for detecting
symbol collisions.

rotate.description: The rotation of the Symbolizer in degrees. Value should be between 0 and 360.

transform.description: Specifies how to capitalize text, similar to the CSS text-transform property.

visibility.description: Defines whether the Symbolizer should be visibile or not.

description: The Style is the main interface and the root for all other interfaces.
